entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 11:09 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NW 42 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
